description:
Now you can have a wealth of information on every member of the United States Congress in your pocket!  

Congress is the must have application that allows anyone to be an informed, involved citizen.  Whether you are a politician, journalist, a political junkie, or even a registered voter, Congress will allow you to keep in touch with the politics that are going on in your government. 
Find your legislator, get news coverage, find voting records, and then let him/her know how you feel with the included contact information!

Congress features an easy to use, intuitive interface that allows you to view all of Congress, or either chamber individually.  It is fully searchable, including by legislator name, state, party, title, or chamber.  

All the information in the app can be updated at any time, which means that after an election you don’t have to wait for an app update – you can get the latest information, all the time!

INCLUDES: 
*A full bio on each legislator 
*Term information, including when the legislator is up for re-election 
*Contact information, including address, phone, fax, web contact 
*Additional resources include links to the legislator's website, Open Congress page, and where available, YouTube and Twitter pages 
*Committee Memberships, including committee details like jurisdiction, committee contact information, and other members 
*Recent News and Blog coverage of that legislator 
*Voting/Legislative Statistics 
*Voting Records, as well as detailed information on each bill, including detailed summary, sponsor, and all voting history 
*GPS based legislator lookup tool to find your Congressmen & women 
*Make your own watchlist of legislators to keep tabs on 
*Statistics on Congress as a whole, including party counts and vacancies 

Version 1.1.2
* App saves legislators watchlist on update
* Improved activity indicators
* Minor bug fixes

Please send feedback or feature requests to contact@lukewalkerapps.com!
